languages.text: "Lord Captain, I distinctly recall this spectre being a trap."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, я точно помню, этот морок — ловушка".

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, recuerdo perfectamente que este espectro era una trampa».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I distinctly recall this spectre being a trap."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, recuerdo perfectamente que este espectro era una trampa».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、この亡霊は罠です。ハッキリと記憶しています」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I distinctly recall this spectre being a trap."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、この亡霊は罠です。ハッキリと記憶しています」

languages.text: “我记得很清楚，舰长大人，这个幽灵是个陷阱。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I distinctly recall this spectre being a trap."

traits.locale_text: “我记得很清楚，舰长大人，这个幽灵是个陷阱。”

languages.text: "Lord Captain, wenn mich nicht alles täuscht, ist dieser Geist eine Falle."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I distinctly recall this spectre being a trap."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, wenn mich nicht alles täuscht, ist dieser Geist eine Falle."

languages.text: « Je suis formel, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, ce spectre est un piège. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I distinctly recall this spectre being a trap."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis formel, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, ce spectre est un piège. »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, bu şeyin bir tuzak olduğunu çok net hatırlıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I distinctly recall this spectre being a trap."
